scripts.build-linux: trash deploy && mkdir deploy && nexe src.index.js -o deploy/scanner -t linux-x64 && node copy-natives.js linux-x64
scripts.build-win32: trash deploy && mkdir deploy && nexe src.index.js -o deploy/scanner.exe -t windows-x64 && node copy-natives.js win32-x64
scripts.license-validate: node-license-validator -p -d --allow-licenses LGPL-3.0 MIT BSD BSD-3-Clause ISC Apache Apache-2.0 "Apache 2.0" WTFPL Unlicense --allow-packages cycle base62
